entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Aupaluk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:04 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Aupaluk Airport 2:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: -31.0°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -35.2°C
Wind: NW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 50 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
